title: Midnight at Tiffany's
description: Matilda is a New York waitress by day, but an aspiring author by night â€“ and she loves to write about kickass heroines!So when she meets gorgeous millionaire Chase Adams, she decides to channel them and act on their sizzling attraction! One magical night later, she's living the dream, but will a trip to Tiffany's make it a reality?
author: Sarah Morgan
